title: Kim Kardashian Debuts New Blonde Hair In Honor of Bestie Paris Hilton

organizations.name: bestie paris hilton kim kardashian debuts new blonde hair in honor of bestie paris hilton

text:
Kim Kardashian Debuts New Blonde Hair In Honor of Bestie Paris Hilton Do blondes really have more fun? by VH1 54m ago 
By Jasmine Washington 
There’s an old saying that when a woman changes her hair, she’s preparing to change her life. If that saying is true, we’ve got to wonder what Kim Kardashian has up her sleeves. 
The reality starlet took to social media showcasing her new blonde ’do while wishing her close friend and fellow blondie, Paris Hilton , a happy birthday. 
Kardashian beamed, “Todayâs vibes channeling Paris! Happy Birthday @ParisHilton Canât wait to celebrate with you soon,” while showcasing her new shoulder length bob in a fierce black and white photo. Today's vibes channeling Paris! Happy Birthday @ParisHilton Can't wait to celebrate with you soon! pic.twitter.com/yav6il6sdB 
— Kim Kardashian West (@KimKardashian) February 18, 2017 
The fun didn’t stop there. Kardashian took her blonde ambition to Snapchat where she toyed around with a few filters. Embedded from www.instagram.com . 
Kardashian’s birthday tribute isn’t the first time she’s gone blonde. The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star ditched her trademark brunette tendrils for platinum blonde tresses back in March 2015. 
Check out these interracial couples dish on their funny hair moments.
